 204    def update_status(self, message: str) -> None:
 205        """Updates the status bar of the main view with a custom message."""
 206        self._view.status_bar.showMessage(message)
 207
 208    def _update_tab(self):
 209        self._interface_manager.current_tab_index = self._view.ui.project_tab_widget.currentIndex()
 210
 211    def _setup_statusbar(self) -> None:
 212        """Sets up the status bar and fills it with the current workspace."""
 213        self._interface_manager.get_main_view().setStatusBar(self._interface_manager.get_main_view().status_bar)

 215    # <editor-fold desc="Help related methods">
 216    def open_help(self, a_page_name: str):
 217        """Opens the pyssa documentation window if it's not already open.
 218
 219        Args:
 220            a_page_name (str): a name of a documentation page to display
 221        """
 222        self._interface_manager.start_wait_spinner()
 223        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening help center ...")
 224        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 225            target=util_async.open_documentation_on_certain_page,
 226            args=(a_page_name, 0),
 227            post_func=self.__await_open_help,
 228        )
 229        self._active_task.start()
 230
 231    def __await_open_help(self):
 232        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 233        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening help center finished.")
 234

 241        # </editor-fold>

 243        # Set the context menu for the buttons
 244        self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.setContextMenuPolicy(3)
 245        self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_list)
 246        self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.setContextMenuPolicy(3)
 247        self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_table)
 248        self._view.ui.btn_import_seq.setContextMenuPolicy(3)  # 3 corresponds to Qt.CustomContextMenu
 249        self._view.ui.btn_import_seq.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_import)
 250        self._view.ui.btn_add_sequence.setContextMenuPolicy(3)  # 3 corresponds to Qt.CustomContextMenu
 251        self._view.ui.btn_add_sequence.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_add)
 252        self._view.ui.btn_save_sequence.setContextMenuPolicy(3)  # 3 corresponds to Qt.CustomContextMenu
 253        self._view.ui.btn_save_sequence.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_save)
 254        self._view.ui.btn_delete_sequence.setContextMenuPolicy(3)  # 3 corresponds to Qt.CustomContextMenu
 255        self._view.ui.btn_delete_sequence.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self._show_context_menu_for_seq_delete)
 256        # add more buttons here ...

 320    # <editor-fold desc="Project menu">
 321    def _close_project(self):
 322        """Closes the current project"""
 323        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 324            target=main_presenter_async.close_project,
 325            args=(self._database_thread, self._pymol_session_manager),
 326            post_func=self.__await_close_project,
 327        )
 328        self._active_task.start()
 329        self.msg_box = basic_boxes.no_buttons("Saving Project",
 330                                              "Please wait the program is saving your project.",
 331                                              QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 332        #self.msg_box.show()
 333        self._interface_manager.restore_default_main_view()
 334        self.update_status("Saving current project ...")
 335        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 336
 337    def __await_close_project(self):
 338        """Await the async closing process."""
 339        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(project.Project())
 340        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 341        #self.msg_box.hide()
 342        self.update_status("Closing project finished.")
 343        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 344
 345    def _create_project(self) -> None:
 346        self._interface_manager.start_wait_spinner()
 347        self._external_controller = create_project_view_controller.CreateProjectViewController(self._interface_manager)
 348        self._external_controller.user_input.connect(self._post_create_project)
 349        self._interface_manager.get_create_view().show()
 350
 351    def _post_create_project(self, user_input: tuple) -> None:
 352        tmp_project_name, tmp_protein_name = user_input
 353        tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
 354            pathlib.Path(f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_project_name}.db"))
 355        with database_manager.DatabaseManager(tmp_project_database_filepath) as db_manager:
 356            db_manager.build_new_database()
 357            db_manager.close_project_database()
 358        self._database_thread = database_thread.DatabaseThread(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 359        self._database_thread.start()
 360        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 361            target=main_presenter_async.create_new_project,
 362            args=(
 363                tmp_project_name,
 364                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().get_workspace_path(),
 365                tmp_protein_name
 366            ),
 367            post_func=self.__await_create_project,
 368        )
 369        self._active_task.start()
 370

 382        #                                                              platform.system()))

 385        #     tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = tmp_project.get_id()

 387        #     tmp_ref_protein.create_new_pymol_session()
 388        #     tmp_ref_protein.save_pymol_session_as_base64_string()

 409    def __await_create_project(self, return_value: tuple):
 410        if return_value[1] is False:
 411            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 412            return
 413
 414        _, tmp_project = return_value
 415        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 416        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 417        self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 418        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 419
 420    def _open_project(self) -> None:
 421        self._interface_manager.start_wait_spinner()
 422        self._external_controller = open_project_view_controller.OpenProjectViewController(self._interface_manager)
 423        self._external_controller.return_value.connect(self._post_open_project)
 424        self._interface_manager.get_open_view().show()
 425
 426    def _post_open_project(self, return_value: str):
 427        if return_value[1] is False:
 428            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 429            return
 430
 431        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening existing project ...")
 432        tmp_project_name = return_value
 433        tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
 434            pathlib.Path(
 435                f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_project_name}.db"
 436            )
 437        )
 438        self._database_thread = database_thread.DatabaseThread(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 439        self._database_thread.start()
 440        self._database_manager.set_database_filepath(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 441        self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 442        tmp_project = self._database_manager.get_project_as_object(
 443            tmp_project_name,
 444            self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path,
 445            self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()
 446        )
 447        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 448        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 449        self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 450        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 451        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening existing project finished.")
 452        # tmp_filepath = pathlib.Path(f"{return_value}.xml")
 453        #
 454        # self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 455        #     target=main_presenter_async.open_project,

 465    def _use_project(self) -> None:
 466        self._external_controller = use_project_view_controller.UseProjectViewController(self._interface_manager)
 467        self._external_controller.user_input.connect(self._post_use_project)
 468        self._interface_manager.get_use_project_view().show()
 469
 470    def _post_use_project(self, user_input: tuple) -> None:
 471        tmp_project_database_filepath = str(pathlib.Path(f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().get_workspace_path()}/{user_input[0]}.db"))
 472        with database_manager.DatabaseManager(tmp_project_database_filepath) as db_manager:
 473            db_manager.build_new_database()
 474            db_manager.close_project_database()
 475
 476        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 477            target=main_presenter_async.create_use_project,
 478            args=(
 479                user_input[0],
 480                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().get_workspace_path(),
 481                user_input[1]
 482            ),
 483            post_func=self.__await_use_project,
 484        )
 485        self._active_task.start()
 486
 487    def __await_use_project(self, return_value: tuple):
 488        _, tmp_project = return_value
 489        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 490        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 491        self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 492        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 493        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Use process finished.")
 494

 503        self._interface_manager.get_delete_view().show()

 505    def import_project(self) -> None:
 506        """Imports a project.xml into the current workspace."""
 507        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
 508        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
 509        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
 510        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getOpenFileName(
 511            self._view,
 512            "Select a project file to import",
 513            "",
 514            "Project Database File (*.db)",
 515        )
 516        if file_path:
 517            file = QtCore.QFile(file_path)
 518            if not file.open(QtCore.QFile.ReadOnly | QtCore.QFile.Text):
 519                print("Error: Cannot open file for reading")
 520                return
 521            tmp_import_filepath = pathlib.Path(file_path)
 522            tmp_project_name_input_dialog = QtWidgets.QInputDialog()
 523            tmp_new_project_name = tmp_project_name_input_dialog.getText(
 524                self._view,
 525                "Project Name",
 526                "Enter A Project Name:",
 527                text=tmp_import_filepath.name.replace(".db", "")
 528            )[0]
 529            # Copy db file into new workspace
 530            tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
 531                pathlib.Path(
 532                    f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_new_project_name}.db"
 533                )
 534            )
 535            shutil.copyfile(file_path, tmp_project_database_filepath)
 536            # Open db and create project
 537            self._database_thread = database_thread.DatabaseThread(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 538            self._database_thread.start()
 539            self._database_manager.set_database_filepath(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 540            self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 541            self._database_manager.update_project_name(tmp_new_project_name)
 542            tmp_project = self._database_manager.get_project_as_object(
 543                tmp_new_project_name,
 544                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path,
 545                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()
 546            )
 547            self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 548
 549            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 550            self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 551            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 552            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Importing project finished.")
 553
 554            # tmp_project = project.Project()
 555            # handler = filesystem_io.ProjectParserHandler(tmp_project,
 556            #                                              self._interface_manager.get_application_settings())
 557            # parser = sax.make_parser()
 558            # parser.setContentHandler(handler)
 559            # parser.parse(file_path)
 560            # file.close()
 561            # tmp_project = handler.get_project()
 562            #
 563            # tmp_project.set_workspace_path(self._workspace_path)
 564            # if len(tmp_project.proteins) <= 1:
 565            #     if self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install == 0:
 566            #         basic_boxes.ok(
 567            #             "Create new project",
 568            #             "Please install local colabfold to import this project!",
 569            #             QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning,
 570            #         )
 571            #         return
 572            #     elif self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold == 0:  # noqa: RET505
 573            #         basic_boxes.ok(
 574            #             "Create new project",
 575            #             "Please install local colabfold to import this project!",
 576            #             QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning,
 577            #         )
 578            #         return
 579            # new_filepath = pathlib.Path(f"{self._workspace_path}/{tmp_project.get_project_name()}.xml")
 580            # tmp_project.serialize_project(new_filepath)
 581            # self._interface_manager.set_new_project(
 582            #     self._interface_manager.get_current_project().deserialize_project(
 583            #         new_filepath, self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()
 584            #     )
 585            # )
 586            # constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(
 587            #     f"Opening the project {self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_name()}."
 588            # )
 589            # self._view.ui.lbl_project_name.setText(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_name())
 590            # self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 591            # basic_boxes.ok(
 592            #     "Import Project",
 593            #     "The project was successfully imported.",
 594            #     QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 595            # )

 597    def export_current_project(self) -> None:
 598        """Exports the current project to an importable format."""
 599        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
 600        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
 601        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
 602        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getSaveFileName(self._view, "Export current project", "", "Project Database File (*.db)")
 603        if file_path:
 604            shutil.copyfile(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath(),
 605                            file_path)
 606            basic_boxes.ok(
 607                "Export Project",
 608                "The project was successfully exported.",
 609                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 610            )

 614    # <editor-fold desc="Analysis menu">
 615    def _distance_analysis(self):
 616        self._external_controller = distance_analysis_view_controller.DistanceAnalysisViewController(
 617            self._interface_manager
 618        )
 619        self._external_controller.job_input.connect(self.start_process_batch)
 620        self._interface_manager.get_distance_analysis_view().show()
 621
 622    def start_process_batch(self, job_input: tuple) -> None:
 623        """Sets up the worker for the analysis task."""
 624        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin analysis process.")
 625
 626        _, tmp_raw_analysis_run_names, tmp_checkbox_state = job_input
 627
 628        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 629            target=main_presenter_async.run_distance_analysis,
 630            args=(
 631                tmp_raw_analysis_run_names,
 632                self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 633                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings(),
 634                tmp_checkbox_state,
 635            ),
 636            post_func=self.post_analysis_process,
 637        )
 638        self._active_task.start()
 639
 640        if not os.path.exists(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS):
 641            os.mkdir(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS)
 642        #self.block_box_analysis.exec_()
 643

 648    # <editor-fold desc="Monomer">
 649    def _predict_monomer(self):
 650        self._external_controller = predict_monomer_view_controller.PredictMonomerViewController(
 651            self._interface_manager
 652        )
 653        self._external_controller.job_input.connect(self._post_predict_monomer)
 654        self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().show()
 655
 656    def _post_predict_monomer(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 657        """Sets up the worker for the prediction of the proteins."""
 658        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 659
 660        # <editor-fold desc="Check if WSL2 and ColabFold are installed">
 661        if globals.g_os == "win32":
 662            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if WSL2 is installed ...")
 663            if not dialog_settings_global.is_wsl2_installed():
 664                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("WSL2 is NOT installed.")
 665                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install = 0
 666                basic_boxes.ok(
 667                    "Prediction",
 668                    "Prediction failed because the WSL2 environment is not installed!",
 669                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 670                )
 671                return
 672            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if Local Colabfold is installed ...")
 673            if not dialog_settings_global.is_local_colabfold_installed():
 674                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Local Colabfold is NOT installed.")
 675                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold = 0
 676                basic_boxes.ok(
 677                    "Prediction",
 678                    "Prediction failed because the ColabFold is not installed!",
 679                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 680                )
 681                return
 682
 683        # </editor-fold>
 684
 685        self.prediction_type = constants.PREDICTION_TYPE_PRED_MONO_ANALYSIS
 686        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin prediction process.")
 687        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Begin prediction process ...")
 688        if result[3] is True:
 689            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running prediction with subsequent analysis.")
 690            # Analysis should be run after the prediction
 691            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 692                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 693                args=(
 694                    result[1],
 695                    result[2],
 696                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 697                ),
 698                post_func=self.__await_monomer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis,
 699            )
 700            self._active_task.start()
 701        else:
 702            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running only a prediction.")
 703            # No analysis after prediction
 704            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 705                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 706                args=(
 707                    result[1],
 708                    result[2],
 709                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 710                ),
 711                post_func=self.__await_predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 712            )
 713            self._active_task.start()
 714
 715        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("A prediction is currently running ...")
 716        self.block_box_prediction = QtWidgets.QMessageBox()
 717        self.block_box_prediction.setIcon(QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 718        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
 719        styles.set_stylesheet(self.block_box_prediction)
 720        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowTitle("Structure Prediction")
 721        self.block_box_prediction.setText("A prediction is currently running.")
 722        btn_abort = self.block_box_prediction.addButton("Abort", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.ActionRole)
 723        self.block_box_prediction.exec_()
 724        if self.block_box_prediction.clickedButton() == btn_abort:
 725            self.abort_prediction()
 726            self.block_box_prediction.close()
 727            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 728        else:
 729            self.block_box_prediction.close()
 730            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 731        # self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("")
 732
 733    def abort_prediction(self) -> None:
 734        """Aborts the running prediction."""
 735        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Structure prediction process was aborted manually.")
 736        subprocess.run(["wsl", "--shutdown"])
 737        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Shutdown of wsl environment.")
 738        filesystem_io.FilesystemCleaner.clean_prediction_scratch_folder()
 739        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Cleaned scratch directory.")
 740        basic_boxes.ok("Abort prediction", "The structure prediction was aborted.", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 741        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 742
 743    def __await_monomer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 744        tmp_exit_code = result[0]
 745        tmp_exit_code_description = [1]
 746        if tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 747            # Prediction was successful
 748            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 749            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure predictions are done.")
 750            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure predictions are done.")
 751            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin analysis process.")
 752            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Running analysis process ...")
 753
 754            tmp_raw_analysis_run_names: list = []
 755            for row_no in range(self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.list_pred_analysis_mono_overview.count()):
 756                tmp_raw_analysis_run_names.append(
 757                    self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.list_pred_analysis_mono_overview.item(row_no).text())
 758
 759            self._database_manager.close_project_database()
 760            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
 761            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 762                target=main_presenter_async.run_distance_analysis,
 763                args=(
 764                    tmp_raw_analysis_run_names,
 765                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 766                    self._interface_manager.get_application_settings(),
 767                    self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.cb_pred_analysis_mono_images.isChecked(),
 768                ),
 769                post_func=self.post_analysis_process,
 770            )
 771            self._active_task.start()
 772            if not os.path.exists(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS):
 773                os.mkdir(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS)
 774
 775        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_WRITING_FASTA_FILES[0]:
 776            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 777            basic_boxes.ok(
 778                "Prediction",
 779                "Prediction failed because there was an error writing the fasta file(s)!",
 780                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 781            )
 782            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 783                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 784            )
 785        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_FASTA_FILES_NOT_FOUND[0]:
 786            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 787            basic_boxes.ok(
 788                "Prediction",
 789                "Prediction failed because the fasta file(s) could not be found!",
 790                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 791            )
 792            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 793                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 794            )
 795        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_PREDICTION_FAILED[0]:
 796            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 797            basic_boxes.ok(
 798                "Prediction",
 799                "Prediction failed because a subprocess failed!",
 800                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 801            )
 802            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 803                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 804            )
 805            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 806        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 807            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 808            basic_boxes.ok(
 809                "Prediction",
 810                "Prediction failed because of an unknown error!",
 811                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 812            )
 813            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 814                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 815            )
 816        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 817        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 818
 819    def post_analysis_process(self, an_exit_code: tuple[int, str, list]) -> None:
 820        """Post process after the analysis thread finished."""
 821        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.debug("post_analysis_process() started ...")
 822        if an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.ERROR_DISTANCE_ANALYSIS_FAILED[0]:
 823            basic_boxes.ok(
 824                "Distance analysis",
 825                "Distance analysis failed because there was an error during the analysis!",
 826                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 827            )
 828            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 829                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
 830            )
 831            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 832                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
 833        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 834            basic_boxes.ok(
 835                "Distance analysis",
 836                "Distance analysis failed because of an unknown error!",
 837                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 838            )
 839            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 840                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
 841            )
 842            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 843                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
 844        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 845            # self._interface_manager.get_current_project().serialize_project(
 846            #     self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_xml_path()
 847            # )
 848            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Project has been saved to project database.")
 849            basic_boxes.ok(
 850                "Structure analysis",
 851                "All structure analysis' are done. Go to results to check the new results.",
 852                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 853            )
 854            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure analysis' are done.")
 855            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure analysis' are done.")
 856        self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 857        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_pair_model()
 858        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 859        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 860
 861    def __await_predict_protein_with_colabfold(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 862        """Process which runs after each prediction job."""
 863        print(result)
 864        tmp_exit_code = result[0]
 865        tmp_exit_code_description = result[1]
 866        if tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_WRITING_FASTA_FILES[0]:
 867            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 868            basic_boxes.ok(
 869                "Prediction",
 870                "Prediction failed because there was an error writing the fasta file(s)!",
 871                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 872            )
 873            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 874                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 875            )
 876            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 877                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 878        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_FASTA_FILES_NOT_FOUND[0]:
 879            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 880            basic_boxes.ok(
 881                "Prediction",
 882                "Prediction failed because the fasta file(s) could not be found!",
 883                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 884            )
 885            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 886                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 887            )
 888            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 889                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 890        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_PREDICTION_FAILED[0]:
 891            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 892            basic_boxes.ok(
 893                "Prediction",
 894                "Prediction failed because a subprocess failed!",
 895                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 896            )
 897            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 898                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 899            )
 900            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 901                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 902        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 903            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 904            basic_boxes.ok(
 905                "Prediction",
 906                "Prediction failed because of an unknown error!",
 907                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 908            )
 909            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 910                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 911            )
 912            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 913        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 914            # Prediction was successful
 915            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
 916            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 917            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 918            basic_boxes.ok(
 919                "Structure prediction",
 920                "All structure predictions are done. Go to View to check the new proteins.",
 921                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 922            )
 923            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure predictions are done.")
 924            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure predictions are done.")
 925        else:
 926            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 927            basic_boxes.ok(
 928                "Prediction",
 929                "Prediction failed because of an unknown case!",
 930                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 931            )
 932            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Prediction failed because of an unknown case!")
 933        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 934

 938    def _predict_multimer(self):
 939        self._external_controller = predict_multimer_view_controller.PredictMultimerViewController(
 940            self._interface_manager
 941        )
 942        self._external_controller.job_input.connect(self._post_predict_monomer)
 943        self._interface_manager.get_predict_multimer_view().show()
 944
 945    def _post_predict_multimer(self, result: tuple):
 946        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 947
 948        # <editor-fold desc="Check if WSL2 and ColabFold are installed">
 949        if globals.g_os == "win32":
 950            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if WSL2 is installed ...")
 951            if not dialog_settings_global.is_wsl2_installed():
 952                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("WSL2 is NOT installed.")
 953                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install = 0
 954                basic_boxes.ok(
 955                    "Prediction",
 956                    "Prediction failed because the WSL2 environment is not installed!",
 957                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 958                )
 959                return
 960            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if Local Colabfold is installed ...")
 961            if not dialog_settings_global.is_local_colabfold_installed():
 962                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Local Colabfold is NOT installed.")
 963                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold = 0
 964                basic_boxes.ok(
 965                    "Prediction",
 966                    "Prediction failed because the ColabFold is not installed!",
 967                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 968                )
 969                return
 970
 971        # </editor-fold>
 972
 973        self.prediction_type = constants.PREDICTION_TYPE_PRED_MULTI_ANALYSIS
 974        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin prediction process.")
 975        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Begin prediction process ...")
 976        if result[3] is True:
 977            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running prediction with subsequent analysis.")
 978            # Analysis should be run after the prediction
 979            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 980                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 981                args=(
 982                    result[1],
 983                    result[2],
 984                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 985                ),
 986                post_func=self.__await_multimer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis,
 987            )
 988            self._active_task.start()
 989        else:
 990            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running only a prediction.")
 991            # No analysis after prediction
 992            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 993                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 994                args=(
 995                    result[1],
 996                    result[2],
 997                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 998                ),
 999                post_func=self.__await_predict_protein_with_colabfold,
1000            )
1001            self._active_task.start()
1002
1003        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("A prediction is currently running ...")
1004        self.block_box_prediction = QtWidgets.QMessageBox()
1005        self.block_box_prediction.setIcon(QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1006        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
1007        styles.set_stylesheet(self.block_box_prediction)
1008        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowTitle("Structure Prediction")
1009        self.block_box_prediction.setText("A prediction is currently running.")
1010        btn_abort = self.block_box_prediction.addButton("Abort", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.ActionRole)
1011        self.block_box_prediction.exec_()
1012        if self.block_box_prediction.clickedButton() == btn_abort:
1013            self.abort_prediction()
1014            self.block_box_prediction.close()
1015            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1016        else:
1017            self.block_box_prediction.close()
1018            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1019
1020    def __await_multimer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis(self, result: tuple) -> None:
1021        tmp_exit_code = result[0]
1022        tmp_exit_code_description = [1]
1023        if tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
1024            # Prediction was successful
1025            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
1026            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure predictions are done.")
1027            self.update_status("All structure predictions are done.")
1028            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin analysis process.")
1029            self.update_status("Begin analysis process ...")
1030            tmp_raw_analysis_run_names: list = []
1031            for row_no in range(self._view.ui.list_pred_analysis_multi_overview.count()):
1032                tmp_raw_analysis_run_names.append(self._view.ui.list_pred_analysis_multi_overview.item(row_no).text())
1033
1034            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1035                target=main_presenter_async.run_distance_analysis,
1036                args=(
1037                    tmp_raw_analysis_run_names,
1038                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
1039                    self._interface_manager.get_application_settings(),
1040                    self._interface_manager.get_predict_multimer_view().cb_pred_analysis_multi_images.isChecked(),
1041                ),
1042                post_func=self.post_analysis_process,
1043            )
1044            self._active_task.start()
1045
1046            if not os.path.exists(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS):
1047                os.mkdir(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS)
1048
1049        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_WRITING_FASTA_FILES[0]:
1050            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
1051            basic_boxes.ok(
1052                "Prediction",
1053                "Prediction failed because there was an error writing the fasta file(s)!",
1054                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1055            )
1056            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
1057                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
1058            )
1059            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
1060                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
1061            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1062        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_FASTA_FILES_NOT_FOUND[0]:
1063            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
1064            basic_boxes.ok(
1065                "Prediction",
1066                "Prediction failed because the fasta file(s) could not be found!",
1067                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1068            )
1069            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
1070                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
1071            )
1072            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
1073                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
1074            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1075        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_PREDICTION_FAILED[0]:
1076            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
1077            basic_boxes.ok(
1078                "Prediction",
1079                "Prediction failed because a subprocess failed!",
1080                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1081            )
1082            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
1083                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
1084            )
1085            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
1086                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
1087            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1088        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
1089            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
1090            basic_boxes.ok(
1091                "Prediction",
1092                "Prediction failed because of an unknown error!",
1093                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1094            )
1095            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
1096                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
1097            )
1098            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
1099                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
1100            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1150    @staticmethod
1151    def clear_all_log_files() -> None:
1152        """Clears all log files generated under .pyssa/logs."""

1154            "Clear log files",
1155            "Are you sure you want to delete all log files?",
1156            QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1157        )
1158        if response:
1159            try:

1161            except PermissionError:
1162                print("The active log file was not deleted.")
1163            if len(os.listdir(str(constants.LOG_PATH))) == 1:
1164                basic_boxes.ok("Clear log files", "All log files could be deleted.",
1165                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1166                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All log files were deleted.")
1167            else:
1168                basic_boxes.ok("Clear log files", "Not all log files could be deleted.",
1169                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning)
1170                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Not all log files were deleted!")

1189    def get_demo_projects(self):
1190        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects ...")
1191        import zipfile
1192        download_dest = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip")
1193        if not os.path.exists(download_dest):
1194            # download demo projects
1195            url = f'https://w-hs.sciebo.de/s/ZHJa6XB9SKWtqGi/download'
1196            tmp_error_flag = False
1197            try:
1198                response = requests.get(url)
1199                response.raise_for_status()  # Check for errors
1200                zipfile = zipfile.ZipFile(BytesIO(response.content))
1201                zipfile.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1202            except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as errh:
1203                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"HTTP Error: {errh}")
1204                tmp_error_flag = True
1205            except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError as errc:
1206                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error Connecting: {errc}")
1207                tmp_error_flag = True
1208            except requests.exceptions.Timeout as errt:
1209                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Timeout Error: {errt}")
1210                tmp_error_flag = True
1211            except requests.exceptions.RequestException as err:
1212                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error: {err}")
1213                tmp_error_flag = True
1214            else:
1215                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(f"Demo projects downloaded and extracted successfully.")
1216
1217            if tmp_error_flag:
1218                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "The download of the demo projects failed. Please try again later.",
1219                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1220                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("The download of the demo projects failed.")
1221                return
1222        else:
1223            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Demo projects are getting extracted ...")
1224            try:
1225                with zipfile.ZipFile(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip"), "r") as zip_ref:
1226                    zip_ref.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1227                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(
1228                    "Demo projects are downloaded and extracted.\n Import of demo projects started ...",
1229                )
1230            except Exception as e:
1231                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Extraction process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1232                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects",
1233                               "Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1234                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1235                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1236                return
1237        try:
1238            path_of_demo_projects = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects")
1239            for tmp_filename in os.listdir(path_of_demo_projects):
1240                # Copy db file into new workspace
1241                tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
1242                    pathlib.Path(
1243                        f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_filename}"
1244                    )
1245                )
1246                tmp_src_filepath = str(pathlib.Path(f"{path_of_demo_projects}/{tmp_filename}"))
1247                shutil.copyfile(tmp_src_filepath, tmp_project_database_filepath)
1248            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Import process of demo projects finished.")
1249        except Exception as e:
1250            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Import process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1251            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Import process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1252                           QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1253            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Import process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1254        else:
1255            self._interface_manager.refresh_workspace_model()
1256            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1257            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Getting demo projects finished without errors.",
1258                       QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1259            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects finished successfully.")
1260

1303    def _preview_image(self):
1304        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1305            target=main_presenter_async.preview_image,
1306            args=(0, 0),
1307            post_func=self.__await_preview_image,
1308        )
1309        self._active_task.start()
1310        self.update_status("Creating preview of image ...")
1311        self._view.wait_spinner.start()

1314        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1317    def _create_ray_traced_image(self) -> None:
1318        save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1319        full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1320        if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1321            tools.quick_log_and_display(
1322                "info",
1323                "No file has been selected.",
1324                self._view.status_bar,
1325                "No file has been selected.",
1326            )
1327            return
1328
1329        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1330            target=main_presenter_async.create_ray_traced_image,
1331            args=(full_file_name[0], self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()),
1332            post_func=self.__await_create_ray_traced_image,
1333        )
1334        self._active_task.start()
1335        self.update_status("Creating ray-traced image ...")
1336        self._view.wait_spinner.start()

1368    def post_save_image(self) -> None:
1369        """Displays a message box which informs that the process has finished."""
1370        self.block_box_uni.hide()
1371        self.block_box_uni.destroy(True)
1372        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Finished image creation.")
1373        QtWidgets.QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
1374        basic_boxes.ok("Finished image creation", "The image has been created.", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)

1376    def save_image(self) -> None:
1377        """Saves the image as a png file."""
1378        QtWidgets.QApplication.setOverrideCursor(Qt.WaitCursor)
1379        if self._view.ui.cb_ray_tracing.isChecked():
1380            save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1381            try:
1382                full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1383                if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1384                    tools.quick_log_and_display(
1385                        "info",
1386                        "No file has been selected.",
1387                        self._view.status_bar,
1388                        "No file has been selected.",
1389                    )
1390                    return
1391                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Creating ray-traced image ...")
1392
1393                # <editor-fold desc="Worker setup">
1394                # --Begin: worker setup
1395                self.tmp_thread = QtCore.QThread()
1396                self.tmp_worker = task_workers.SaveRayImageWorker(self.renderer, full_file_name[0])
1397                self.tmp_thread = task_workers.setup_worker_for_work(
1398                    self.tmp_thread,
1399                    self.tmp_worker,
1400                    self.display_view_page,
1401                )
1402                self.tmp_worker.finished.connect(self.post_save_image)
1403                self.tmp_thread.start()
1404                # --End: worker setup
1405
1406                # </editor-fold>
1407                gui_utils.setup_standard_block_box(
1408                    self.block_box_uni,
1409                    "Save ray-trace image",
1410                    "Creating the ray-traced image ...",
1411                )
1412                self.block_box_uni.exec_()
1413
1414                # cmd.ray(2400, 2400, renderer=int(self.renderer))
1415                # cmd.png(full_file_name[0], dpi=300)
1416
1417            except FileExistsError:
1418                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1419                    "error",
1420                    "File exists already.",
1421                    self._view.status_bar,
1422                    "File exists already.",
1423                )
1424            except pymol.CmdException:
1425                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1426                    "error",
1427                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL while saving the " "an image",
1428                    self._view.status_bar,
1429                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL",
1430                )
1431        else:
1432            save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1433            try:
1434                full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1435                if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1436                    tools.quick_log_and_display(
1437                        "info",
1438                        "No file has been selected.",
1439                        self._view.status_bar,
1440                        "No file has been selected.",
1441                    )
1442                    return
1443                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Creating draw image ...")
1444                cmd.draw(2400, 2400)
1445                cmd.png(full_file_name[0], dpi=300)
1446                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Finished image creation.")
1447                basic_boxes.ok(
1448                    "Finished image creation",
1449                    "The image has been created.",
1450                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1451                )
1452            except FileExistsError:
1453                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1454                    "error",
1455                    "File exists already.",
1456                    self._view.status_bar,
1457                    "File exists already.",
1458                )
1459            except pymol.CmdException:
1460                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1461                    "error",
1462                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL while saving the " "an image",
1463                    self._view.status_bar,
1464                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL",
1465                )
1466            finally:
1467                QtWidgets.QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
1468

1488    def _set_new_sequence_name_in_table_item(self):
1489        try:

1495    def _rename_sequence(self):
1496        tmp_old_name = self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE).name
1497        tmp_new_name = self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.currentItem().text()

1500        self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.model().setData(self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex(), tmp_new_name, Qt.DisplayRole)
1501        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1502            enums.SQLQueryType.UPDATE_SEQUENCE_NAME, (0, tmp_new_name, tmp_old_name, tmp_seq)
1503        )
1504        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)

1519    def _post_import_sequence(self, return_value: tuple):
1520        tmp_fasta_filepath, _ = return_value
1521        with open(tmp_fasta_filepath, "r") as handle:
1522            for tmp_record in SeqIO.parse(handle, "fasta"):
1523                # Append each SeqRecord object to the list
1524                self._interface_manager.get_current_project().sequences.append(tmp_record)
1525                self._database_manager.insert_new_sequence(tmp_record)
1526        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1527        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1528
1529    def _add_sequence(self):
1530        self._external_controller = add_sequence_view_controller.AddSequenceViewController(self._interface_manager)
1531        self._external_controller.return_value.connect(self._post_add_sequence)
1532        self._external_controller.restore_default_view()
1533        self._interface_manager.get_add_sequence_view().show()
1534
1535    def _post_add_sequence(self, return_value: tuple):
1536        logger.info(f"Adding new sequence {return_value[0]} with {return_value[1]} to the current project.")
1537        tmp_seq_name = return_value[0]
1538        tmp_sequence = return_value[1]
1539        tmp_seq_record = SeqRecord.SeqRecord(tmp_sequence, name=tmp_seq_name)
1540        self._interface_manager.get_current_project().sequences.append(tmp_seq_record)
1541        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1542            enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_SEQUENCE,
1543            (0, tmp_seq_record)
1544        )
1545        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1546        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1547        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()

1549    def _save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file(self):
1550        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1551        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1552        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
1553        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
1554        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getSaveFileName(
1555            self._view,
1556            "Save Protein Sequence",
1557            "",
1558            "FASTA File (*.fasta)",
1559        )
1560        if file_path:
1561            tmp_seq_record = self._interface_manager.get_current_sequence_list_index_object()
1562            # pre-process seq record object for the SeqIO module
1563            if tmp_seq_record.id == "<unknown id>":
1564                tmp_seq_record.id = tmp_seq_record.name
1565            tmp_seq_record.seq = Seq(tmp_seq_record.seq)
1566            # defines the task to save the sequence as .fasta file
1567            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1568                target=main_presenter_async.save_selected_protein_sequence_as_fasta_file,
1569                args=(
1570                    tmp_seq_record,
1571                    file_path,
1572                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath()
1573                ),
1574                post_func=self.__await_save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file,
1575            )
1576            self._active_task.start()
1577        else:
1578            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1579
1580    def __await_save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file(self, result: tuple):
1581        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1582        if result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
1583            basic_boxes.ok(
1584                "Save Protein Sequence",
1585                "Saving the sequence as .fasta file failed!",
1586                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1587            )
1588        elif result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
1589            basic_boxes.ok(
1590                "Save Protein Sequence",
1591                "The sequence was successfully saved as .fasta file.",
1592                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1593            )
1594        else:
1595            basic_boxes.ok(
1596                "Save Protein Sequence",
1597                "Saving the sequence as .fasta file failed with an unexpected error!",
1598                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1599            )
1600        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1601        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1602
1603    def _delete_selected_sequence(self):
1604        response: bool = gui_utils.warning_message_sequence_gets_deleted()
1605        if response:
1606            tmp_seq_record: "SeqRecord.SeqRecord" = self._interface_manager.get_current_sequence_list_index_object()
1607            tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.DELETE_EXISTING_SEQUENCE,
1608                                                                          (0, tmp_seq_record))
1609            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1610            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().delete_specific_sequence(tmp_seq_record.name)
1611            self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1612            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1613            # extra ui changes
1614            self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.setRowCount(0)
1615            self._view.build_sequence_table()

1619    # <editor-fold desc="Proteins tab methods">
1620    def open_context_menu_for_proteins(self, position):
1621        indexes = self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.selectedIndexes()
1622        if len(indexes) > 0:
1623            level = 0
1624            index = indexes[0]
1625            while index.parent().isValid():
1626                index = index.parent()
1627                level += 1
1628        else:
1629            return
1630
1631        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1632
1633        if tmp_type == "protein":
1634            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1635        elif tmp_type == "chain":
1636            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1637        else:
1638            logger.warning("Unknown object type occurred in Protein tab.")
1639            return
1640        tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair: bool = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().check_if_protein_is_in_any_protein_pair(
1641            tmp_protein.get_molecule_object()
1642        )
1643        self.protein_context_menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
1644        if level == 0:
1645            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Clean selected protein"))
1646            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action.triggered.connect(self.clean_protein_update)
1647            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Rename selected protein"))
1648            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.triggered.connect(self.rename_selected_protein_structure)
1649
1650            # <editor-fold desc="Check if protein is in any protein pair">
1651            if tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair:
1652                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(False)
1653            else:
1654                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(True)
1655
1656            # </editor-fold>
1657
1658        elif level == 1:
1659            tmp_show_sequence_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Show sequence"))
1660            tmp_show_sequence_action.triggered.connect(self._show_protein_chain_sequence)
1661        elif level == 2:
1662            self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Edit object"))
1663
1664        self.protein_context_menu.exec_(self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.viewport().mapToGlobal(position))
1665
1666    def __slot_show_protein_information(self) -> None:
1667        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1668
1669        if tmp_type == "protein":
1670            self._interface_manager.show_chain_pymol_parameters(
1671                self._interface_manager.get_child_index_of_get_current_protein_tree_index()
1672            )
1673            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1674        elif tmp_type == "chain":
1675            self._interface_manager.show_chain_pymol_parameters(
1676                self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index()
1677            )
1678            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1679        else:
1680            logger.warning("Unknown object type occurred in Protein tab.")
1681            return
1682        self._interface_manager.manage_buttons_for_proteins_tab(
1683            tmp_type,
1684            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().check_if_protein_is_in_any_protein_pair(
1685                tmp_protein.get_molecule_object()
1686            ),
1687        )
1688        # protein in session
1689        if self._pymol_session_manager.is_the_current_protein_in_session():
1690            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1691            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1692            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(True)
1693            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(True)
1694            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(True)
1695        else:
1696            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1697            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1698            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(False)
1699            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(False)
1700            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(False)
1701
1702    def _open_protein_pymol_session(self):
1703        if not self._pymol_session_manager.is_the_current_session_empty():
1704            logger.info("The current session is not empty. Reinitialize session now ...")
1705            self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
1706            logger.info("Reinitializing session finished.")
1707        tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1708        try:
1709            self._pymol_session_manager.load_protein_session(tmp_protein)
1710            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(False)
1711        except RuntimeError:
1712            logger.error("The protein name could not be found in the object list in PyMOL!")
1713            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(False)
1714            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(False)
1715            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1716            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1717        else:
1718            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(True)
1719            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(True)
1720            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(True)
1721            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1722            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1723            self._view.ui.lbl_session_name.setText(f"Session Name: {self._pymol_session_manager.session_name}")
1724            logger.info("Successfully opened protein session.")
1725
1726    def _change_chain_color_proteins(self) -> None:
1727        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1728        tmp_color = self._view.cb_chain_color.currentText()
1729        if tmp_type == "chain":
1730            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1731            tmp_raw_chain = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1732            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
1733        elif tmp_type == "protein":
1734            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1735            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.chains[0]
1736        else:
1737            return
1738
1739        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein.get_molecule_object():
1740            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
1741            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
1742            try:
1743                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.color_selection(tmp_color)
1744            except pymol.CmdException:
1745                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
1746            else:
1747                # Update pymol parameter in memory
1748                tmp_chain.pymol_parameters["chain_color"] = tmp_color
1749                # Update pymol parameter in database
1750                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
1751                    db_manager.open_project_database()
1752                    db_manager.update_protein_chain_color(tmp_chain.get_id(), tmp_color)
1753                    db_manager.close_project_database()
1754                self._save_protein_pymol_session(tmp_protein)
1755        else:
1756            logger.warning("The color of a protein chain could not be changed. This can be due to UI setup reasons.")
1757
1758    def _change_chain_representation_proteins(self) -> None:
1759        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1760        tmp_representation = self._view.cb_chain_representation.currentText()
1761        if tmp_type == "chain":
1762            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1763            tmp_raw_chain = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1764            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
1765        elif tmp_type == "protein":
1766            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1767            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.chains[0]
1768        else:
1769            return
1770
1771        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein.get_molecule_object():
1772            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
1773            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
1774            try:
1775                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.change_representaion_of_selection(tmp_representation)
1776            except pymol.CmdException:
1777                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
1778            else:
1779                # Update pymol parameter in memory
1780                tmp_chain.pymol_parameters[enums.PymolParameterEnum.REPRESENTATION.value] = tmp_representation
1781                # Update pymol parameter in database
1782                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(
1783                        str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
1784                    db_manager.open_project_database()
1785                    db_manager.update_protein_chain_representation(tmp_chain.get_id(), tmp_representation)
1786                    db_manager.close_project_database()
1787                self._save_protein_pymol_session(tmp_protein)
1788        else:
1789            logger.warning("The representation of a protein chain could not be changed. This can be due to UI setup reasons.")

1802    def _post_import_protein_structure(self, return_value: tuple):
1803        tmp_protein_name, tmp_name_len = return_value
1804        if tmp_name_len == 4:
1805            tmp_ref_protein = protein.Protein(tmp_protein_name.upper())
1806            tmp_ref_protein.set_id(self._database_manager.get_latest_id_of_protein_table())
1807            tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_id()
1808            tmp_ref_protein.add_protein_structure_data_from_pdb_db(tmp_protein_name.upper())
1809            tmp_ref_protein.add_id_to_all_chains(self._database_manager.get_latest_id_of_a_specific_table("Chain"))
1810            tmp_ref_protein.create_new_pymol_session()
1811            tmp_ref_protein.save_pymol_session_as_base64_string()
1812            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().add_existing_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1813            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(
1814                database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN,
1815                                                     (0, tmp_ref_protein)))
1816            # tmp_work = (enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN, (0, tmp_ref_protein))
1817            # self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_work)
1818            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Create project finished with protein from the PDB.")
1819        elif tmp_name_len > 0:
1820            # local pdb file as input
1821            pdb_filepath = pathlib.Path(tmp_protein_name)
1822            graphic_operations.setup_default_session_graphic_settings()
1823            tmp_ref_protein = protein.Protein(
1824                pdb_filepath.name.replace(".pdb","")
1825            )
1826            tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_id()
1827            tmp_ref_protein.add_protein_structure_data_from_local_pdb_file(pathlib.Path(tmp_protein_name))
1828            tmp_ref_protein.create_new_pymol_session()
1829            tmp_ref_protein.save_pymol_session_as_base64_string()
1830            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().add_existing_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1831            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(
1832                database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN,
1833                                                     (0, tmp_ref_protein)))
1834            # tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._database_manager.insert_new_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1835            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Create project finished with protein from local filesystem.")
1836        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1837        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1838

1907            "Clean protein",

1917                ),
1918                post_func=self.__await_clean_protein_update,

1922        else:

1936    def post_rename_selected_protein_structure(self, return_value: tuple) -> None:
1937        """Renames a selected protein structure."""
1938        if return_value[1] is True:
1939            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1940                target=main_presenter_async.rename_selected_protein_structure,
1941                args=(
1942                    self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object(),
1943                    return_value[0],
1944                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath()
1945                ),
1946                post_func=self.__await_post_rename_selected_protein_structure,
1947            )
1948            self._active_task.start()
1949        else:
1950            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1951
1952    def __await_post_rename_selected_protein_structure(self, result: tuple) -> None:
1953        self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.model().setData(
1954            self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index(), result[1], enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE
1955        )
1956        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1957            enums.SQLQueryType.UPDATE_PYMOL_SESSION_PROTEIN,
1958            (
1959                0,
1960                self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.model().data(
1961                    self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index(),
1962                    enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE
1963                )
1964            )
1965        )
1966        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1967        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1968        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1969        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1971    def _show_protein_chain_sequence(self) -> None:
1972        self.tmp_txt_browser = QtWidgets.QTextBrowser()
1973        try:
1974            tmp_chain: "chain.Chain" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1975            if tmp_chain.chain_sequence.sequence == "":
1976                self.tmp_txt_browser.setText(
1977                    "This chain is a non-protein chain."
1978                )
1979            else:
1980                self.tmp_txt_browser.setText(
1981                    tmp_chain.chain_sequence.sequence
1982                )
1983        except AttributeError:
1984            return
1985        else:
1986            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowTitle("View Protein Sequence")
1987            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
1988            self.tmp_txt_browser.resize(500, 150)
1989            self.tmp_txt_browser.show()

1996    def save_scene(self) -> None:
1997        """Saves the current view as a new PyMOL scene."""

2006    def _get_protein_information_of_protein_pair(self):
2007        tmp_type = self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.model().data(
2008            self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.currentIndex(), enums.ModelEnum.TYPE_ROLE
2009        )
2010        if tmp_type == "protein":
2011            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2012            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index_object()
2013            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_child_index_of_get_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2014        elif tmp_type == "chain":
2015            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_grand_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2016            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2017            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2018        elif tmp_type == "protein_pair":
2019            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index_object()
2020            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index().child(0, 0).data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2021            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index().child(0, 0).child(0, 0)
2022        else:
2023            return "", "", "", ""
2024        return tmp_type, tmp_protein_pair, tmp_protein, tmp_chain_index

2075    def _change_chain_color_protein_pairs(self) -> None:
2076        tmp_type, tmp_protein_pair, tmp_protein, tmp_chain_index = self._get_protein_information_of_protein_pair()
2077        tmp_color: str = self._view.cb_chain_color_protein_pair.currentText()
2078        if tmp_type == "chain":
2079            tmp_raw_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2080            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
2081        elif self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.TYPE_ROLE) == "protein":
2082            tmp_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2083        else:
2084            return
2085
2086        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein_pair" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein_pair.name:
2087            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
2088            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
2089            try:
2090                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.color_selection(tmp_color)
2091            except pymol.CmdException:
2092                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
2093            else:
2094                # Update pymol parameter in database
2095                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(
2096                        str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
2097                    db_manager.open_project_database()
2098                    db_manager.update_pymol_parameter_for_certain_protein_chain_in_protein_pair(
2099                        tmp_protein_pair.get_id(),
2100                        tmp_protein.get_id(),
2101                        tmp_chain.chain_letter,
2102                        enums.PymolParameterEnum.COLOR.value,
2103                        tmp_color,
2104                    )
2105                    db_manager.close_project_database()
2106                self._save_protein_pair_pymol_session(tmp_protein_pair)
2107        else:
2108            logger.warning("The color of a protein chain could not be changed. This can be due to UI setup reasons.")
2109
