2184    def _delete_protein_pair_from_project(self):
2185        response: bool = gui_utils.warning_message_protein_pair_gets_deleted()
2186        if response:
2187            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index_object()
2188            tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
2189                enums.SQLQueryType.DELETE_EXISTING_PROTEIN_PAIR, (0, tmp_protein_pair.get_id())
2190            )
2191            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
2192            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().delete_specific_protein_pair(tmp_protein_pair.name)
2193            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_pair_model()
2194            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
2195            # extra ui changes
2196            self._view.ui.protein_pairs_table_widget.setRowCount(0)
2197            self._view.build_protein_pairs_table()

 217    def open_help(self, a_page_name: str):
 218        """Opens the pyssa documentation window if it's not already open.
 219
 220        Args:
 221            a_page_name (str): a name of a documentation page to display
 222        """
 223        self._interface_manager.start_wait_spinner()
 224        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening help center ...")
 225        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 226            target=util_async.open_documentation_on_certain_page,
 227            args=(a_page_name, 0),
 228            post_func=self.__await_open_help,
 229        )
 230        self._active_task.start()
 231

 233        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 234        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening help center finished.")

 322    def _close_project(self):
 323        """Closes the current project"""
 324        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 325            target=main_presenter_async.close_project,
 326            args=(self._database_thread, self._pymol_session_manager),
 327            post_func=self.__await_close_project,
 328        )
 329        self._active_task.start()
 330        self.msg_box = basic_boxes.no_buttons("Saving Project",
 331                                              "Please wait the program is saving your project.",
 332                                              QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 333        #self.msg_box.show()
 334        self._interface_manager.restore_default_main_view()
 335        self.update_status("Saving current project ...")
 336        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 337
 338    def __await_close_project(self):
 339        """Await the async closing process."""
 340        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(project.Project())
 341        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 342        #self.msg_box.hide()
 343        self.update_status("Closing project finished.")
 344        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

 410    def __await_create_project(self, return_value: tuple):
 411        if return_value[1] is False:
 412            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 413            return
 414
 415        _, tmp_project = return_value
 416        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 417        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 418        self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 419        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()

 422        self._interface_manager.start_wait_spinner()

 427    def _post_open_project(self, return_value: str):
 428        if return_value[1] is False:
 429            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 430            return

 432        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening existing project ...")
 433        tmp_project_name = return_value
 434        tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
 435            pathlib.Path(

 437            )
 438        )
 439        self._database_thread = database_thread.DatabaseThread(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 440        self._database_thread.start()
 441        self._database_manager.set_database_filepath(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 442        self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 443        tmp_project = self._database_manager.get_project_as_object(
 444            tmp_project_name,
 445            self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path,

 447        )
 448        self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 449        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 450        self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 451        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 452        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Opening existing project finished.")

 471    def _post_use_project(self, user_input: tuple) -> None:
 472        tmp_project_database_filepath = str(pathlib.Path(f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().get_workspace_path()}/{user_input[0]}.db"))
 473        with database_manager.DatabaseManager(tmp_project_database_filepath) as db_manager:
 474            db_manager.build_new_database()
 475            db_manager.close_project_database()
 476
 477        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 478            target=main_presenter_async.create_use_project,
 479            args=(
 480                user_input[0],
 481                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().get_workspace_path(),
 482                user_input[1]
 483            ),
 484            post_func=self.__await_use_project,
 485        )
 486        self._active_task.start()

 506    def import_project(self) -> None:
 507        """Imports a project.xml into the current workspace."""
 508        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
 509        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
 510        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
 511        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getOpenFileName(
 512            self._view,
 513            "Select a project file to import",
 514            "",
 515            "Project Database File (*.db)",
 516        )
 517        if file_path:
 518            file = QtCore.QFile(file_path)
 519            if not file.open(QtCore.QFile.ReadOnly | QtCore.QFile.Text):
 520                print("Error: Cannot open file for reading")
 521                return
 522            tmp_import_filepath = pathlib.Path(file_path)
 523            tmp_project_name_input_dialog = QtWidgets.QInputDialog()
 524            tmp_new_project_name = tmp_project_name_input_dialog.getText(
 525                self._view,
 526                "Project Name",
 527                "Enter A Project Name:",
 528                text=tmp_import_filepath.name.replace(".db", "")
 529            )[0]
 530            # Copy db file into new workspace
 531            tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
 532                pathlib.Path(
 533                    f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_new_project_name}.db"
 534                )
 535            )
 536            shutil.copyfile(file_path, tmp_project_database_filepath)
 537            # Open db and create project
 538            self._database_thread = database_thread.DatabaseThread(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 539            self._database_thread.start()
 540            self._database_manager.set_database_filepath(tmp_project_database_filepath)
 541            self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 542            self._database_manager.update_project_name(tmp_new_project_name)
 543            tmp_project = self._database_manager.get_project_as_object(
 544                tmp_new_project_name,
 545                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path,
 546                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()
 547            )
 548            self._interface_manager.set_new_project(tmp_project)
 549
 550            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 551            self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
 552            self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 553            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Importing project finished.")
 554
 555            # tmp_project = project.Project()
 556            # handler = filesystem_io.ProjectParserHandler(tmp_project,
 557            #                                              self._interface_manager.get_application_settings())
 558            # parser = sax.make_parser()
 559            # parser.setContentHandler(handler)
 560            # parser.parse(file_path)
 561            # file.close()
 562            # tmp_project = handler.get_project()
 563            #
 564            # tmp_project.set_workspace_path(self._workspace_path)
 565            # if len(tmp_project.proteins) <= 1:
 566            #     if self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install == 0:
 567            #         basic_boxes.ok(
 568            #             "Create new project",
 569            #             "Please install local colabfold to import this project!",
 570            #             QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning,
 571            #         )
 572            #         return
 573            #     elif self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold == 0:  # noqa: RET505
 574            #         basic_boxes.ok(
 575            #             "Create new project",
 576            #             "Please install local colabfold to import this project!",
 577            #             QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning,
 578            #         )
 579            #         return
 580            # new_filepath = pathlib.Path(f"{self._workspace_path}/{tmp_project.get_project_name()}.xml")
 581            # tmp_project.serialize_project(new_filepath)
 582            # self._interface_manager.set_new_project(
 583            #     self._interface_manager.get_current_project().deserialize_project(
 584            #         new_filepath, self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()
 585            #     )
 586            # )
 587            # constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(
 588            #     f"Opening the project {self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_name()}."
 589            # )
 590            # self._view.ui.lbl_project_name.setText(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_name())
 591            # self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()

 595            #     QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 596            # )
 597
 598    def export_current_project(self) -> None:
 599        """Exports the current project to an importable format."""
 600        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
 601        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
 602        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
 603        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getSaveFileName(self._view, "Export current project", "", "Project Database File (*.db)")
 604        if file_path:
 605            shutil.copyfile(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath(),
 606                            file_path)
 607            basic_boxes.ok(
 608                "Export Project",
 609                "The project was successfully exported.",
 610                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 611            )

 615    # <editor-fold desc="Analysis menu">
 616    def _distance_analysis(self):
 617        self._external_controller = distance_analysis_view_controller.DistanceAnalysisViewController(
 618            self._interface_manager
 619        )
 620        self._external_controller.job_input.connect(self.start_process_batch)
 621        self._interface_manager.get_distance_analysis_view().show()
 622
 623    def start_process_batch(self, job_input: tuple) -> None:
 624        """Sets up the worker for the analysis task."""
 625        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin analysis process.")
 626
 627        _, tmp_raw_analysis_run_names, tmp_checkbox_state = job_input
 628
 629        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 630            target=main_presenter_async.run_distance_analysis,
 631            args=(
 632                tmp_raw_analysis_run_names,
 633                self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 634                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings(),
 635                tmp_checkbox_state,
 636            ),
 637            post_func=self.post_analysis_process,
 638        )
 639        self._active_task.start()
 640
 641        if not os.path.exists(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS):
 642            os.mkdir(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS)
 643        #self.block_box_analysis.exec_()
 644

 649    # <editor-fold desc="Monomer">
 650    def _predict_monomer(self):
 651        self._external_controller = predict_monomer_view_controller.PredictMonomerViewController(
 652            self._interface_manager
 653        )
 654        self._external_controller.job_input.connect(self._post_predict_monomer)
 655        self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().show()
 656
 657    def _post_predict_monomer(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 658        """Sets up the worker for the prediction of the proteins."""
 659        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 660
 661        # <editor-fold desc="Check if WSL2 and ColabFold are installed">
 662        if globals.g_os == "win32":
 663            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if WSL2 is installed ...")
 664            if not dialog_settings_global.is_wsl2_installed():
 665                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("WSL2 is NOT installed.")
 666                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install = 0
 667                basic_boxes.ok(
 668                    "Prediction",
 669                    "Prediction failed because the WSL2 environment is not installed!",
 670                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 671                )
 672                return
 673            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if Local Colabfold is installed ...")
 674            if not dialog_settings_global.is_local_colabfold_installed():
 675                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Local Colabfold is NOT installed.")
 676                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold = 0
 677                basic_boxes.ok(
 678                    "Prediction",
 679                    "Prediction failed because the ColabFold is not installed!",
 680                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 681                )
 682                return
 683
 684        # </editor-fold>
 685
 686        self.prediction_type = constants.PREDICTION_TYPE_PRED_MONO_ANALYSIS
 687        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin prediction process.")
 688        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Begin prediction process ...")
 689        if result[3] is True:
 690            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running prediction with subsequent analysis.")
 691            # Analysis should be run after the prediction
 692            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 693                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 694                args=(
 695                    result[1],
 696                    result[2],
 697                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 698                ),
 699                post_func=self.__await_monomer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis,
 700            )
 701            self._active_task.start()
 702        else:
 703            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running only a prediction.")
 704            # No analysis after prediction
 705            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 706                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 707                args=(
 708                    result[1],
 709                    result[2],
 710                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 711                ),
 712                post_func=self.__await_predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 713            )
 714            self._active_task.start()
 715
 716        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("A prediction is currently running ...")
 717        self.block_box_prediction = QtWidgets.QMessageBox()
 718        self.block_box_prediction.setIcon(QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 719        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
 720        styles.set_stylesheet(self.block_box_prediction)
 721        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowTitle("Structure Prediction")
 722        self.block_box_prediction.setText("A prediction is currently running.")
 723        btn_abort = self.block_box_prediction.addButton("Abort", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.ActionRole)
 724        self.block_box_prediction.exec_()
 725        if self.block_box_prediction.clickedButton() == btn_abort:
 726            self.abort_prediction()
 727            self.block_box_prediction.close()
 728            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 729        else:
 730            self.block_box_prediction.close()
 731            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 732        # self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("")
 733
 734    def abort_prediction(self) -> None:
 735        """Aborts the running prediction."""
 736        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Structure prediction process was aborted manually.")
 737        subprocess.run(["wsl", "--shutdown"])
 738        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Shutdown of wsl environment.")
 739        filesystem_io.FilesystemCleaner.clean_prediction_scratch_folder()
 740        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Cleaned scratch directory.")
 741        basic_boxes.ok("Abort prediction", "The structure prediction was aborted.", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
 742        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 743
 744    def __await_monomer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 745        tmp_exit_code = result[0]
 746        tmp_exit_code_description = [1]
 747        if tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 748            # Prediction was successful
 749            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 750            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure predictions are done.")
 751            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure predictions are done.")
 752            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin analysis process.")
 753            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Running analysis process ...")
 754
 755            tmp_raw_analysis_run_names: list = []
 756            for row_no in range(self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.list_pred_analysis_mono_overview.count()):
 757                tmp_raw_analysis_run_names.append(
 758                    self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.list_pred_analysis_mono_overview.item(row_no).text())
 759
 760            self._database_manager.close_project_database()
 761            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
 762            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 763                target=main_presenter_async.run_distance_analysis,
 764                args=(
 765                    tmp_raw_analysis_run_names,
 766                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 767                    self._interface_manager.get_application_settings(),
 768                    self._interface_manager.get_predict_monomer_view().ui.cb_pred_analysis_mono_images.isChecked(),
 769                ),
 770                post_func=self.post_analysis_process,
 771            )
 772            self._active_task.start()
 773            if not os.path.exists(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS):
 774                os.mkdir(constants.SCRATCH_DIR_ANALYSIS)
 775
 776        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_WRITING_FASTA_FILES[0]:
 777            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 778            basic_boxes.ok(
 779                "Prediction",
 780                "Prediction failed because there was an error writing the fasta file(s)!",
 781                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 782            )
 783            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 784                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 785            )
 786        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_FASTA_FILES_NOT_FOUND[0]:
 787            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 788            basic_boxes.ok(
 789                "Prediction",
 790                "Prediction failed because the fasta file(s) could not be found!",
 791                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 792            )
 793            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 794                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 795            )
 796        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_PREDICTION_FAILED[0]:
 797            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 798            basic_boxes.ok(
 799                "Prediction",
 800                "Prediction failed because a subprocess failed!",
 801                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 802            )
 803            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 804                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 805            )
 806            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 807        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 808            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 809            basic_boxes.ok(
 810                "Prediction",
 811                "Prediction failed because of an unknown error!",
 812                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 813            )
 814            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 815                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 816            )
 817        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
 818        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 819
 820    def post_analysis_process(self, an_exit_code: tuple[int, str, list]) -> None:
 821        """Post process after the analysis thread finished."""
 822        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.debug("post_analysis_process() started ...")
 823        if an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.ERROR_DISTANCE_ANALYSIS_FAILED[0]:
 824            basic_boxes.ok(
 825                "Distance analysis",
 826                "Distance analysis failed because there was an error during the analysis!",
 827                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 828            )
 829            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 830                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
 831            )
 832            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 833                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
 834        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 835            basic_boxes.ok(
 836                "Distance analysis",
 837                "Distance analysis failed because of an unknown error!",
 838                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 839            )
 840            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 841                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
 842            )
 843            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 844                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
 845        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 846            # self._interface_manager.get_current_project().serialize_project(
 847            #     self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_xml_path()
 848            # )
 849            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Project has been saved to project database.")
 850            basic_boxes.ok(
 851                "Structure analysis",
 852                "All structure analysis' are done. Go to results to check the new results.",
 853                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 854            )
 855            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure analysis' are done.")
 856            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure analysis' are done.")
 857        self._database_manager.open_project_database()
 858        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_pair_model()
 859        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 860        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 861
 862    def __await_predict_protein_with_colabfold(self, result: tuple) -> None:
 863        """Process which runs after each prediction job."""
 864        print(result)
 865        tmp_exit_code = result[0]
 866        tmp_exit_code_description = result[1]
 867        if tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_WRITING_FASTA_FILES[0]:
 868            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 869            basic_boxes.ok(
 870                "Prediction",
 871                "Prediction failed because there was an error writing the fasta file(s)!",
 872                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 873            )
 874            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 875                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 876            )
 877            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 878                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 879        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_FASTA_FILES_NOT_FOUND[0]:
 880            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 881            basic_boxes.ok(
 882                "Prediction",
 883                "Prediction failed because the fasta file(s) could not be found!",
 884                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 885            )
 886            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 887                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 888            )
 889            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 890                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 891        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.ERROR_PREDICTION_FAILED[0]:
 892            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 893            basic_boxes.ok(
 894                "Prediction",
 895                "Prediction failed because a subprocess failed!",
 896                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 897            )
 898            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 899                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 900            )
 901            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
 902                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 903        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
 904            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 905            basic_boxes.ok(
 906                "Prediction",
 907                "Prediction failed because of an unknown error!",
 908                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 909            )
 910            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
 911                f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}",
 912            )
 913            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(f"Prediction ended with exit code {tmp_exit_code}: {tmp_exit_code_description}")
 914        elif tmp_exit_code == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
 915            # Prediction was successful
 916            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
 917            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
 918            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 919            basic_boxes.ok(
 920                "Structure prediction",
 921                "All structure predictions are done. Go to View to check the new proteins.",
 922                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
 923            )
 924            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure predictions are done.")
 925            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure predictions are done.")
 926        else:
 927            self.block_box_prediction.destroy(True)
 928            basic_boxes.ok(
 929                "Prediction",
 930                "Prediction failed because of an unknown case!",
 931                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 932            )
 933            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Prediction failed because of an unknown case!")
 934        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()
 935

 939    def _predict_multimer(self):
 940        self._external_controller = predict_multimer_view_controller.PredictMultimerViewController(
 941            self._interface_manager
 942        )

 946    def _post_predict_multimer(self, result: tuple):
 947        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
 948
 949        # <editor-fold desc="Check if WSL2 and ColabFold are installed">
 950        if globals.g_os == "win32":
 951            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if WSL2 is installed ...")
 952            if not dialog_settings_global.is_wsl2_installed():
 953                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("WSL2 is NOT installed.")
 954                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().wsl_install = 0
 955                basic_boxes.ok(
 956                    "Prediction",
 957                    "Prediction failed because the WSL2 environment is not installed!",
 958                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 959                )
 960                return
 961            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Checking if Local Colabfold is installed ...")
 962            if not dialog_settings_global.is_local_colabfold_installed():
 963                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Local Colabfold is NOT installed.")
 964                self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().local_colabfold = 0
 965                basic_boxes.ok(
 966                    "Prediction",
 967                    "Prediction failed because the ColabFold is not installed!",
 968                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
 969                )
 970                return
 971
 972        # </editor-fold>
 973
 974        self.prediction_type = constants.PREDICTION_TYPE_PRED_MULTI_ANALYSIS
 975        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Begin prediction process.")
 976        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Begin prediction process ...")
 977        if result[3] is True:
 978            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running prediction with subsequent analysis.")
 979            # Analysis should be run after the prediction
 980            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 981                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 982                args=(
 983                    result[1],
 984                    result[2],
 985                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 986                ),
 987                post_func=self.__await_multimer_prediction_for_subsequent_analysis,
 988            )
 989            self._active_task.start()
 990        else:
 991            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Running only a prediction.")
 992            # No analysis after prediction
 993            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
 994                target=main_presenter_async.predict_protein_with_colabfold,
 995                args=(
 996                    result[1],
 997                    result[2],
 998                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project(),
 999                ),
1000                post_func=self.__await_predict_protein_with_colabfold,
1001            )
1002            self._active_task.start()
1003
1004        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("A prediction is currently running ...")
1005        self.block_box_prediction = QtWidgets.QMessageBox()
1006        self.block_box_prediction.setIcon(QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1007        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
1008        styles.set_stylesheet(self.block_box_prediction)
1009        self.block_box_prediction.setWindowTitle("Structure Prediction")
1010        self.block_box_prediction.setText("A prediction is currently running.")
1011        btn_abort = self.block_box_prediction.addButton("Abort", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.ActionRole)
1012        self.block_box_prediction.exec_()
1013        if self.block_box_prediction.clickedButton() == btn_abort:
1014            self.abort_prediction()
1015            self.block_box_prediction.close()
1016            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1017        else:
1018            self.block_box_prediction.close()
1019            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1128    def restore_settings(self) -> None:
1129        """Restores the settings.xml file to the default values."""
1130        out = gui_utils.warning_dialog_restore_settings("Are you sure you want to restore all settings?")
1131        if out:
1132            tools.restore_default_settings(self._interface_manager.get_application_settings())
1133            self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Settings were successfully restored.")
1134            logging.info("Settings were successfully restored.")

1137            logging.info("Settings were not modified.")

1142    def open_logs(self) -> None:
1143        """Opens a file explorer with all log files and can open a log file in the default application."""
1144        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1145        log_path = str(constants.LOG_PATH)
1146        file_dialog.setDirectory(log_path)
1147        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getOpenFileName(self._view, "Select a log file to open", "", "LOG File (*.log)")
1148        if file_path:
1149            os.startfile(file_path)
1150
1151    @staticmethod
1152    def clear_all_log_files() -> None:
1153        """Clears all log files generated under .pyssa/logs."""
1154        response = basic_boxes.yes_or_no(
1155            "Clear log files",
1156            "Are you sure you want to delete all log files?",
1157            QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1158        )
1159        if response:
1160            try:
1161                shutil.rmtree(str(constants.LOG_PATH))
1162            except PermissionError:
1163                print("The active log file was not deleted.")
1164            if len(os.listdir(str(constants.LOG_PATH))) == 1:
1165                basic_boxes.ok("Clear log files", "All log files could be deleted.",
1166                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1167                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All log files were deleted.")
1168            else:
1169                basic_boxes.ok("Clear log files", "Not all log files could be deleted.",
1170                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Warning)
1171                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.warning("Not all log files were deleted!")
1172

1190    def get_demo_projects(self):
1191        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects ...")
1192        import zipfile
1193        download_dest = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip")
1194        if not os.path.exists(download_dest):
1195            # download demo projects
1196            url = f'https://w-hs.sciebo.de/s/ZHJa6XB9SKWtqGi/download'
1197            tmp_error_flag = False
1198            try:
1199                response = requests.get(url)
1200                response.raise_for_status()  # Check for errors
1201                zipfile = zipfile.ZipFile(BytesIO(response.content))
1202                zipfile.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1203            except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as errh:
1204                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"HTTP Error: {errh}")
1205                tmp_error_flag = True
1206            except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError as errc:
1207                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error Connecting: {errc}")
1208                tmp_error_flag = True
1209            except requests.exceptions.Timeout as errt:
1210                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Timeout Error: {errt}")
1211                tmp_error_flag = True
1212            except requests.exceptions.RequestException as err:
1213                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error: {err}")
1214                tmp_error_flag = True
1215            else:
1216                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(f"Demo projects downloaded and extracted successfully.")
1217
1218            if tmp_error_flag:
1219                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "The download of the demo projects failed. Please try again later.",
1220                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1221                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("The download of the demo projects failed.")
1222                return
1223        else:
1224            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Demo projects are getting extracted ...")
1225            try:
1226                with zipfile.ZipFile(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip"), "r") as zip_ref:
1227                    zip_ref.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1228                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(
1229                    "Demo projects are downloaded and extracted.\n Import of demo projects started ...",
1230                )
1231            except Exception as e:
1232                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Extraction process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1233                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects",
1234                               "Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1235                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1236                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1237                return
1238        try:
1239            path_of_demo_projects = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects")
1240            for tmp_filename in os.listdir(path_of_demo_projects):
1241                # Copy db file into new workspace
1242                tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
1243                    pathlib.Path(
1244                        f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_filename}"
1245                    )
1246                )
1247                tmp_src_filepath = str(pathlib.Path(f"{path_of_demo_projects}/{tmp_filename}"))
1248                shutil.copyfile(tmp_src_filepath, tmp_project_database_filepath)
1249            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Import process of demo projects finished.")
1250        except Exception as e:
1251            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Import process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1252            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Import process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1253                           QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1254            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Import process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1255        else:
1256            self._interface_manager.refresh_workspace_model()
1257            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1258            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Getting demo projects finished without errors.",
1259                       QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1260            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects finished successfully.")
1261

1304    def _preview_image(self):
1305        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1306            target=main_presenter_async.preview_image,
1307            args=(0, 0),
1308            post_func=self.__await_preview_image,
1309        )
1310        self._active_task.start()
1311        self.update_status("Creating preview of image ...")
1312        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1313

1315        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1318    def _create_ray_traced_image(self) -> None:
1319        save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1320        full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1321        if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1322            tools.quick_log_and_display(
1323                "info",
1324                "No file has been selected.",
1325                self._view.status_bar,
1326                "No file has been selected.",
1327            )
1328            return
1329
1330        self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1331            target=main_presenter_async.create_ray_traced_image,
1332            args=(full_file_name[0], self._interface_manager.get_application_settings()),
1333            post_func=self.__await_create_ray_traced_image,
1334        )
1335        self._active_task.start()
1336        self.update_status("Creating ray-traced image ...")
1337        self._view.wait_spinner.start()

1369    def post_save_image(self) -> None:
1370        """Displays a message box which informs that the process has finished."""
1371        self.block_box_uni.hide()
1372        self.block_box_uni.destroy(True)
1373        self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Finished image creation.")
1374        QtWidgets.QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
1375        basic_boxes.ok("Finished image creation", "The image has been created.", QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1376
1377    def save_image(self) -> None:
1378        """Saves the image as a png file."""
1379        QtWidgets.QApplication.setOverrideCursor(Qt.WaitCursor)
1380        if self._view.ui.cb_ray_tracing.isChecked():
1381            save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1382            try:
1383                full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1384                if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1385                    tools.quick_log_and_display(
1386                        "info",
1387                        "No file has been selected.",
1388                        self._view.status_bar,
1389                        "No file has been selected.",
1390                    )
1391                    return
1392                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Creating ray-traced image ...")
1393
1394                # <editor-fold desc="Worker setup">
1395                # --Begin: worker setup
1396                self.tmp_thread = QtCore.QThread()
1397                self.tmp_worker = task_workers.SaveRayImageWorker(self.renderer, full_file_name[0])
1398                self.tmp_thread = task_workers.setup_worker_for_work(
1399                    self.tmp_thread,
1400                    self.tmp_worker,
1401                    self.display_view_page,
1402                )
1403                self.tmp_worker.finished.connect(self.post_save_image)
1404                self.tmp_thread.start()
1405                # --End: worker setup
1406
1407                # </editor-fold>
1408                gui_utils.setup_standard_block_box(
1409                    self.block_box_uni,
1410                    "Save ray-trace image",
1411                    "Creating the ray-traced image ...",
1412                )
1413                self.block_box_uni.exec_()
1414
1415                # cmd.ray(2400, 2400, renderer=int(self.renderer))
1416                # cmd.png(full_file_name[0], dpi=300)
1417
1418            except FileExistsError:
1419                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1420                    "error",
1421                    "File exists already.",
1422                    self._view.status_bar,
1423                    "File exists already.",
1424                )
1425            except pymol.CmdException:
1426                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1427                    "error",
1428                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL while saving the " "an image",
1429                    self._view.status_bar,
1430                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL",
1431                )
1432        else:
1433            save_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1434            try:
1435                full_file_name = save_dialog.getSaveFileName(caption="Save Image", filter="Image (*.png)")
1436                if full_file_name == ("", ""):
1437                    tools.quick_log_and_display(
1438                        "info",
1439                        "No file has been selected.",
1440                        self._view.status_bar,
1441                        "No file has been selected.",
1442                    )
1443                    return
1444                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Creating draw image ...")
1445                cmd.draw(2400, 2400)
1446                cmd.png(full_file_name[0], dpi=300)
1447                self._view.status_bar.showMessage("Finished image creation.")
1448                basic_boxes.ok(
1449                    "Finished image creation",
1450                    "The image has been created.",
1451                    QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1452                )
1453            except FileExistsError:
1454                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1455                    "error",
1456                    "File exists already.",
1457                    self._view.status_bar,
1458                    "File exists already.",
1459                )
1460            except pymol.CmdException:
1461                tools.quick_log_and_display(
1462                    "error",
1463                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL while saving the " "an image",
1464                    self._view.status_bar,
1465                    "Unexpected Error from PyMOL",
1466                )
1467            finally:
1468                QtWidgets.QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
1469

1475    def _open_text_editor_for_seq(self):
1476        self.tmp_txt_browser = QtWidgets.QTextBrowser()
1477        try:
1478            self.tmp_txt_browser.setText(
1479                self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.currentItem().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE).seq
1480            )
1481        except AttributeError:
1482            return
1483        else:
1484            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowTitle("View Sequence")
1485            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
1486            self.tmp_txt_browser.resize(500, 150)
1487            self.tmp_txt_browser.show()

1489    def _set_new_sequence_name_in_table_item(self):
1490        try:
1491            tmp_new_seq = self._view.line_edit_seq_name.text()
1492            self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.currentItem().setText(tmp_new_seq)
1493        except AttributeError:
1494            return

1496    def _rename_sequence(self):
1497        tmp_old_name = self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE).name
1498        tmp_new_name = self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.currentItem().text()
1499        tmp_seq = self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE).seq
1500        self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE).name = tmp_new_name
1501        self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.model().setData(self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex(), tmp_new_name, Qt.DisplayRole)
1502        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1503            enums.SQLQueryType.UPDATE_SEQUENCE_NAME, (0, tmp_new_name, tmp_old_name, tmp_seq)
1504        )
1505        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1506
1507    def _show_sequence_information(self):
1508        self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.cellChanged.disconnect(self._rename_sequence)
1509        self._interface_manager.show_sequence_parameters(
1510            self._view.ui.seqs_list_view.currentIndex()
1511        )
1512        self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.cellChanged.connect(self._rename_sequence)
1513        self._view.ui.btn_save_sequence.setEnabled(True)
1514        self._view.ui.btn_delete_sequence.setEnabled(True)

1516    def _import_sequence(self) -> None:
1517        self._interface_manager.get_import_sequence_view().return_value.connect(self._post_import_sequence)
1518        self._interface_manager.get_import_sequence_view().show()
1519
1520    def _post_import_sequence(self, return_value: tuple):
1521        tmp_fasta_filepath, _ = return_value
1522        with open(tmp_fasta_filepath, "r") as handle:
1523            for tmp_record in SeqIO.parse(handle, "fasta"):
1524                # Append each SeqRecord object to the list
1525                self._interface_manager.get_current_project().sequences.append(tmp_record)
1526                self._database_manager.insert_new_sequence(tmp_record)
1527        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1528        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1529
1530    def _add_sequence(self):
1531        self._external_controller = add_sequence_view_controller.AddSequenceViewController(self._interface_manager)
1532        self._external_controller.return_value.connect(self._post_add_sequence)
1533        self._external_controller.restore_default_view()
1534        self._interface_manager.get_add_sequence_view().show()
1535
1536    def _post_add_sequence(self, return_value: tuple):
1537        logger.info(f"Adding new sequence {return_value[0]} with {return_value[1]} to the current project.")
1538        tmp_seq_name = return_value[0]
1539        tmp_sequence = return_value[1]
1540        tmp_seq_record = SeqRecord.SeqRecord(tmp_sequence, name=tmp_seq_name)
1541        self._interface_manager.get_current_project().sequences.append(tmp_seq_record)
1542        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1543            enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_SEQUENCE,
1544            (0, tmp_seq_record)
1545        )
1546        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1547        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1548        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1549
1550    def _save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file(self):
1551        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1552        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1553        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
1554        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
1555        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getSaveFileName(
1556            self._view,
1557            "Save Protein Sequence",
1558            "",
1559            "FASTA File (*.fasta)",
1560        )
1561        if file_path:
1562            tmp_seq_record = self._interface_manager.get_current_sequence_list_index_object()
1563            # pre-process seq record object for the SeqIO module
1564            if tmp_seq_record.id == "<unknown id>":
1565                tmp_seq_record.id = tmp_seq_record.name
1566            tmp_seq_record.seq = Seq(tmp_seq_record.seq)
1567            # defines the task to save the sequence as .fasta file
1568            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1569                target=main_presenter_async.save_selected_protein_sequence_as_fasta_file,
1570                args=(
1571                    tmp_seq_record,
1572                    file_path,
1573                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath()
1574                ),
1575                post_func=self.__await_save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file,
1576            )
1577            self._active_task.start()
1578        else:
1579            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1580
1581    def __await_save_selected_sequence_as_fasta_file(self, result: tuple):
1582        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1583        if result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
1584            basic_boxes.ok(
1585                "Save Protein Sequence",
1586                "Saving the sequence as .fasta file failed!",
1587                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1588            )
1589        elif result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
1590            basic_boxes.ok(
1591                "Save Protein Sequence",
1592                "The sequence was successfully saved as .fasta file.",
1593                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1594            )
1595        else:
1596            basic_boxes.ok(
1597                "Save Protein Sequence",
1598                "Saving the sequence as .fasta file failed with an unexpected error!",
1599                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1600            )
1601        self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1602        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1603
1604    def _delete_selected_sequence(self):
1605        response: bool = gui_utils.warning_message_sequence_gets_deleted()
1606        if response:
1607            tmp_seq_record: "SeqRecord.SeqRecord" = self._interface_manager.get_current_sequence_list_index_object()
1608            tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.DELETE_EXISTING_SEQUENCE,
1609                                                                          (0, tmp_seq_record))
1610            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1611            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().delete_specific_sequence(tmp_seq_record.name)
1612            self._interface_manager.refresh_sequence_model()
1613            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1614            # extra ui changes
1615            self._view.ui.seqs_table_widget.setRowCount(0)
1616            self._view.build_sequence_table()

1620    # <editor-fold desc="Proteins tab methods">
1621    def open_context_menu_for_proteins(self, position):
1622        indexes = self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.selectedIndexes()
1623        if len(indexes) > 0:
1624            level = 0
1625            index = indexes[0]
1626            while index.parent().isValid():
1627                index = index.parent()
1628                level += 1
1629        else:
1630            return
1631
1632        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1633
1634        if tmp_type == "protein":
1635            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1636        elif tmp_type == "chain":
1637            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1638        else:
1639            logger.warning("Unknown object type occurred in Protein tab.")
1640            return
1641        tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair: bool = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().check_if_protein_is_in_any_protein_pair(
1642            tmp_protein.get_molecule_object()
1643        )
1644        self.protein_context_menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
1645        if level == 0:
1646            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Clean selected protein"))
1647            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action.triggered.connect(self.clean_protein_update)
1648            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Rename selected protein"))
1649            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.triggered.connect(self.rename_selected_protein_structure)
1650
1651            # <editor-fold desc="Check if protein is in any protein pair">
1652            if tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair:
1653                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(False)
1654            else:
1655                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(True)
1656
1657            # </editor-fold>
1658
1659        elif level == 1:
1660            tmp_show_sequence_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Show sequence"))
1661            tmp_show_sequence_action.triggered.connect(self._show_protein_chain_sequence)
1662        elif level == 2:
1663            self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Edit object"))
1664
1665        self.protein_context_menu.exec_(self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.viewport().mapToGlobal(position))
1666
1667    def __slot_show_protein_information(self) -> None:
1668        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1669
1670        if tmp_type == "protein":
1671            self._interface_manager.show_chain_pymol_parameters(
1672                self._interface_manager.get_child_index_of_get_current_protein_tree_index()
1673            )
1674            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1675        elif tmp_type == "chain":
1676            self._interface_manager.show_chain_pymol_parameters(
1677                self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index()
1678            )
1679            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1680        else:
1681            logger.warning("Unknown object type occurred in Protein tab.")
1682            return
1683        self._interface_manager.manage_buttons_for_proteins_tab(
1684            tmp_type,
1685            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().check_if_protein_is_in_any_protein_pair(
1686                tmp_protein.get_molecule_object()
1687            ),
1688        )
1689        # protein in session
1690        if self._pymol_session_manager.is_the_current_protein_in_session():
1691            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1692            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1693            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(True)
1694            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(True)
1695            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(True)
1696        else:
1697            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1698            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1699            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(False)
1700            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(False)
1701            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(False)
1702
1703    def _open_protein_pymol_session(self):
1704        if not self._pymol_session_manager.is_the_current_session_empty():
1705            logger.info("The current session is not empty. Reinitialize session now ...")
1706            self._pymol_session_manager.reinitialize_session()
1707            logger.info("Reinitializing session finished.")
1708        tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1709        try:
1710            self._pymol_session_manager.load_protein_session(tmp_protein)
1711            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(False)
1712        except RuntimeError:
1713            logger.error("The protein name could not be found in the object list in PyMOL!")
1714            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(False)
1715            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(False)
1716            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1717            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(False)
1718        else:
1719            self._view.cb_chain_color.setEnabled(True)
1720            self._view.cb_chain_representation.setEnabled(True)
1721            self._view.ui.action_protein_regions.setEnabled(True)
1722            self._view.ui.btn_create_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1723            self._view.ui.btn_update_protein_scene.setEnabled(True)
1724            self._view.ui.lbl_session_name.setText(f"Session Name: {self._pymol_session_manager.session_name}")
1725            logger.info("Successfully opened protein session.")
1726
1727    def _change_chain_color_proteins(self) -> None:
1728        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1729        tmp_color = self._view.cb_chain_color.currentText()
1730        if tmp_type == "chain":
1731            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1732            tmp_raw_chain = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1733            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
1734        elif tmp_type == "protein":
1735            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1736            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.chains[0]
1737        else:
1738            return
1739
1740        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein.get_molecule_object():
1741            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
1742            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
1743            try:
1744                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.color_selection(tmp_color)
1745            except pymol.CmdException:
1746                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
1747            else:
1748                # Update pymol parameter in memory
1749                tmp_chain.pymol_parameters["chain_color"] = tmp_color
1750                # Update pymol parameter in database
1751                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
1752                    db_manager.open_project_database()
1753                    db_manager.update_protein_chain_color(tmp_chain.get_id(), tmp_color)
1754                    db_manager.close_project_database()
1755                self._save_protein_pymol_session(tmp_protein)
1756        else:
1757            logger.warning("The color of a protein chain could not be changed. This can be due to UI setup reasons.")
1758
1759    def _change_chain_representation_proteins(self) -> None:
1760        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1761        tmp_representation = self._view.cb_chain_representation.currentText()
1762        if tmp_type == "chain":
1763            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1764            tmp_raw_chain = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1765            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
1766        elif tmp_type == "protein":
1767            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1768            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.chains[0]
1769        else:
1770            return
1771
1772        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein.get_molecule_object():
1773            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
1774            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
1775            try:
1776                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.change_representaion_of_selection(tmp_representation)
1777            except pymol.CmdException:
1778                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
1779            else:
1780                # Update pymol parameter in memory
1781                tmp_chain.pymol_parameters[enums.PymolParameterEnum.REPRESENTATION.value] = tmp_representation
1782                # Update pymol parameter in database
1783                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(
1784                        str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
1785                    db_manager.open_project_database()
1786                    db_manager.update_protein_chain_representation(tmp_chain.get_id(), tmp_representation)
1787                    db_manager.close_project_database()

1792    def _save_protein_pymol_session(self, a_protein: "protein.Protein"):

1796        )

1803    def _post_import_protein_structure(self, return_value: tuple):
1804        tmp_protein_name, tmp_name_len = return_value
1805        if tmp_name_len == 4:
1806            tmp_ref_protein = protein.Protein(tmp_protein_name.upper())
1807            tmp_ref_protein.set_id(self._database_manager.get_latest_id_of_protein_table())
1808            tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_id()
1809            tmp_ref_protein.add_protein_structure_data_from_pdb_db(tmp_protein_name.upper())
1810            tmp_ref_protein.add_id_to_all_chains(self._database_manager.get_latest_id_of_a_specific_table("Chain"))
1811            tmp_ref_protein.create_new_pymol_session()
1812            tmp_ref_protein.save_pymol_session_as_base64_string()
1813            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().add_existing_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1814            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(
1815                database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN,
1816                                                     (0, tmp_ref_protein)))
1817            # tmp_work = (enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN, (0, tmp_ref_protein))
1818            # self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_work)
1819            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Create project finished with protein from the PDB.")
1820        elif tmp_name_len > 0:
1821            # local pdb file as input
1822            pdb_filepath = pathlib.Path(tmp_protein_name)
1823            graphic_operations.setup_default_session_graphic_settings()
1824            tmp_ref_protein = protein.Protein(
1825                pdb_filepath.name.replace(".pdb","")
1826            )
1827            tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_id()
1828            tmp_ref_protein.add_protein_structure_data_from_local_pdb_file(pathlib.Path(tmp_protein_name))
1829            tmp_ref_protein.create_new_pymol_session()
1830            tmp_ref_protein.save_pymol_session_as_base64_string()
1831            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().add_existing_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1832            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(
1833                database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.INSERT_NEW_PROTEIN,
1834                                                     (0, tmp_ref_protein)))
1835            # tmp_ref_protein.db_project_id = self._database_manager.insert_new_protein(tmp_ref_protein)
1836            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Create project finished with protein from local filesystem.")
1837        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1838        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1839
1840    def _delete_protein(self):
1841        response: bool = gui_utils.warning_message_protein_gets_deleted()
1842        if response:
1843            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
1844            tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(enums.SQLQueryType.DELETE_EXISTING_PROTEIN,
1845                                                                          (0, tmp_protein.get_id()))
1846            self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1847            self._interface_manager.get_current_project().delete_specific_protein(tmp_protein.get_molecule_object())
1848            self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1849            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1850            # extra ui changes
1851            self._view.ui.proteins_table_widget.setRowCount(0)
1852            self._view.build_proteins_table()

1854    def _save_selected_protein_structure_as_pdb_file(self) -> None:
1855        """Saves selected protein as pdb file."""
1856        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1857        file_dialog = QtWidgets.QFileDialog()
1858        desktop_path = QtCore.QStandardPaths.standardLocations(QtCore.QStandardPaths.DesktopLocation)[0]
1859        file_dialog.setDirectory(desktop_path)
1860        file_path, _ = file_dialog.getSaveFileName(
1861            self._view,
1862            "Save Protein Structure",
1863            "",
1864            "Protein Data Bank File (*.pdb)",
1865        )
1866        if file_path:
1867            tmp_protein: "protein.Protein" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1868            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1869                target=main_presenter_async.save_selected_protein_structure_as_pdb_file,
1870                args=(
1871                    tmp_protein,
1872                    file_path,
1873                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath()
1874                ),
1875                post_func=self.__await_save_selected_protein_structure_as_pdb_file,
1876            )
1877            self._active_task.start()
1878        else:
1879            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1880
1881    def __await_save_selected_protein_structure_as_pdb_file(self, result: tuple) -> None:
1882        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1883        if result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
1884            basic_boxes.ok(
1885                "Save protein structure",
1886                "Saving the protein as .pdb file failed!",
1887                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1888            )
1889        elif result[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
1890            basic_boxes.ok(
1891                "Save protein structure",
1892                "The protein was successfully saved as .pdb file.",
1893                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1894            )
1895        else:
1896            basic_boxes.ok(
1897                "Save protein structure",
1898                "Saving the protein as .pdb file failed with an unexpected error!",
1899                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
1900            )
1901        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1902        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1903
1904    def clean_protein_update(self) -> None:
1905        """Cleans the selected protein structure."""
1906        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1907        if basic_boxes.yes_or_no(
1908            "Clean protein",
1909            "Are you sure you want to clean this protein?\n" "This will remove all organic and solvent components!",
1910            QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
1911        ):
1912
1913            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1914                target=main_presenter_async.clean_protein_update,
1915                args=(
1916                    self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object(),
1917                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath(),
1918                ),
1919                post_func=self.__await_clean_protein_update,
1920            )
1921            self._active_task.start()
1922            self.update_status("Cleaning protein ...")
1923        else:
1924            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("No protein has been cleaned.")
1925            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1926
1927    def __await_clean_protein_update(self) -> None:
1928        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()
1929

1934        self._external_controller.user_input.connect(self.post_rename_selected_protein_structure)

1937    def post_rename_selected_protein_structure(self, return_value: tuple) -> None:
1938        """Renames a selected protein structure."""
1939        if return_value[1] is True:
1940            self._active_task = tasks.Task(
1941                target=main_presenter_async.rename_selected_protein_structure,
1942                args=(
1943                    self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object(),
1944                    return_value[0],
1945                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath()
1946                ),
1947                post_func=self.__await_post_rename_selected_protein_structure,
1948            )
1949            self._active_task.start()
1950        else:
1951            self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1953    def __await_post_rename_selected_protein_structure(self, result: tuple) -> None:
1954        self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.model().setData(
1955            self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index(), result[1], enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE
1956        )
1957        tmp_database_operation = database_operation.DatabaseOperation(
1958            enums.SQLQueryType.UPDATE_PYMOL_SESSION_PROTEIN,
1959            (
1960                0,
1961                self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.model().data(
1962                    self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index(),
1963                    enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE
1964                )
1965            )
1966        )
1967        self._database_thread.put_database_operation_into_queue(tmp_database_operation)
1968        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_model()
1969        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1970        self._view.wait_spinner.stop()

1972    def _show_protein_chain_sequence(self) -> None:
1973        self.tmp_txt_browser = QtWidgets.QTextBrowser()
1974        try:
1975            tmp_chain: "chain.Chain" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1976            if tmp_chain.chain_sequence.sequence == "":
1977                self.tmp_txt_browser.setText(
1978                    "This chain is a non-protein chain."
1979                )
1980            else:
1981                self.tmp_txt_browser.setText(
1982                    tmp_chain.chain_sequence.sequence
1983                )
1984        except AttributeError:
1985            return
1986        else:
1987            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowTitle("View Protein Sequence")
1988            self.tmp_txt_browser.setWindowIcon(QtGui.QIcon(constants.PLUGIN_LOGO_FILEPATH))
1989            self.tmp_txt_browser.resize(500, 150)
1990            self.tmp_txt_browser.show()

1994        """Updates the current selected PyMOL scene."""

1997    def save_scene(self) -> None:
1998        """Saves the current view as a new PyMOL scene."""
1999        # returns tuple with (name, bool)
2000        scene_name = QtWidgets.QInputDialog.getText(self._view, "Save Scene", "Enter scene name:")
2001        if scene_name[1]:
2002            cmd.scene(key=scene_name[0], action="append")

2007    def _get_protein_information_of_protein_pair(self):
2008        tmp_type = self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.model().data(
2009            self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.currentIndex(), enums.ModelEnum.TYPE_ROLE
2010        )
2011        if tmp_type == "protein":
2012            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2013            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index_object()
2014            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_child_index_of_get_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2015        elif tmp_type == "chain":
2016            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_grand_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2017            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2018            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index()
2019        elif tmp_type == "protein_pair":
2020            tmp_protein_pair: "protein_pair.ProteinPair" = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index_object()
2021            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index().child(0, 0).data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2022            tmp_chain_index = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_pair_tree_index().child(0, 0).child(0, 0)
2023        else:
2024            return "", "", "", ""
2025        return tmp_type, tmp_protein_pair, tmp_protein, tmp_chain_index

2076    def _change_chain_color_protein_pairs(self) -> None:
2077        tmp_type, tmp_protein_pair, tmp_protein, tmp_chain_index = self._get_protein_information_of_protein_pair()
2078        tmp_color: str = self._view.cb_chain_color_protein_pair.currentText()
2079        if tmp_type == "chain":
2080            tmp_raw_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2081            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
2082        elif self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.TYPE_ROLE) == "protein":
2083            tmp_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2084        else:
2085            return
2086
2087        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein_pair" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein_pair.name:
2088            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
2089            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
2090            try:
2091                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.color_selection(tmp_color)
2092            except pymol.CmdException:
2093                logger.warning("No protein in session found. This can lead to more serious problems.")
2094            else:
2095                # Update pymol parameter in database
2096                with database_manager.DatabaseManager(
2097                        str(self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath())) as db_manager:
2098                    db_manager.open_project_database()
2099                    db_manager.update_pymol_parameter_for_certain_protein_chain_in_protein_pair(
2100                        tmp_protein_pair.get_id(),
2101                        tmp_protein.get_id(),
2102                        tmp_chain.chain_letter,
2103                        enums.PymolParameterEnum.COLOR.value,
2104                        tmp_color,
2105                    )
2106                    db_manager.close_project_database()
2107                self._save_protein_pair_pymol_session(tmp_protein_pair)
2108        else:
2109            logger.warning("The color of a protein chain could not be changed. This can be due to UI setup reasons.")
2110
2111    def _change_chain_representation_protein_pairs(self) -> None:
2112        tmp_type, tmp_protein_pair, tmp_protein, tmp_chain_index = self._get_protein_information_of_protein_pair()
2113        tmp_representation: str = self._view.cb_chain_representation_protein_pair.currentText()
2114        if tmp_type == "chain":
2115            tmp_raw_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2116            tmp_chain = tmp_protein.get_chain_by_letter(tmp_raw_chain.chain_letter)
2117        elif self._view.ui.protein_pairs_tree_view.currentIndex().data(enums.ModelEnum.TYPE_ROLE) == "protein":
2118            tmp_chain = tmp_chain_index.data(enums.ModelEnum.OBJECT_ROLE)
2119        else:
2120            return
2121
2122        if self._pymol_session_manager.session_object_type == "protein_pair" and self._pymol_session_manager.session_name == tmp_protein_pair.name:
2123            # Update pymol parameter in PyMOL
2124            tmp_protein.pymol_selection.set_selection_for_a_single_chain(tmp_chain.chain_letter)
2125            try:
2126                tmp_protein.pymol_selection.change_representaion_of_selection(tmp_representation)
2127            except pymol.CmdException:
2128                # TODO: this try-except block is necessary for the logic, but this is bad practice and should be redone!
