def post_analysis_process(self, an_exit_code: tuple[int, str, list]) -> None: 
820    def post_analysis_process(self, an_exit_code: tuple[int, str, list]) -> None:
821        """Post process after the analysis thread finished."""
822        constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.debug("post_analysis_process() started ...")
823        if an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.ERROR_DISTANCE_ANALYSIS_FAILED[0]:
824            basic_boxes.ok(
825                "Distance analysis",
826                "Distance analysis failed because there was an error during the analysis!",
827                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
828            )
829            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
830                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
831            )
832            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
833                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
834        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ONE_UNKNOWN_ERROR[0]:
835            basic_boxes.ok(
836                "Distance analysis",
837                "Distance analysis failed because of an unknown error!",
838                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical,
839            )
840            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(
841                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}",
842            )
843            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar(
844                f"Distance analysis ended with exit code {an_exit_code[0]}: {an_exit_code[1]}")
845        elif an_exit_code[0] == exit_codes.EXIT_CODE_ZERO[0]:
846            # self._interface_manager.get_current_project().serialize_project(
847            #     self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_project_xml_path()
848            # )
849            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Project has been saved to project database.")
850            basic_boxes.ok(
851                "Structure analysis",
852                "All structure analysis' are done. Go to results to check the new results.",
853                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information,
854            )
855            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("All structure analysis' are done.")
856            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("All structure analysis' are done.")
857        self._database_manager.open_project_database()
858        self._interface_manager.refresh_protein_pair_model()
859        self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
860        self._interface_manager.stop_wait_spinner()

Post process after the analysis thread finished.

def get_demo_projects(self): 
1190    def get_demo_projects(self):
1191        self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects ...")
1192        import zipfile
1193        download_dest = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip")
1194        if not os.path.exists(download_dest):
1195            # download demo projects
1196            url = f'https://w-hs.sciebo.de/s/ZHJa6XB9SKWtqGi/download'
1197            tmp_error_flag = False
1198            try:
1199                response = requests.get(url)
1200                response.raise_for_status()  # Check for errors
1201                zipfile = zipfile.ZipFile(BytesIO(response.content))
1202                zipfile.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1203            except requests.exceptions.HTTPError as errh:
1204                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"HTTP Error: {errh}")
1205                tmp_error_flag = True
1206            except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError as errc:
1207                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error Connecting: {errc}")
1208                tmp_error_flag = True
1209            except requests.exceptions.Timeout as errt:
1210                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Timeout Error: {errt}")
1211                tmp_error_flag = True
1212            except requests.exceptions.RequestException as err:
1213                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Error: {err}")
1214                tmp_error_flag = True
1215            else:
1216                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(f"Demo projects downloaded and extracted successfully.")
1217
1218            if tmp_error_flag:
1219                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "The download of the demo projects failed. Please try again later.",
1220                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1221                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("The download of the demo projects failed.")
1222                return
1223        else:
1224            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Demo projects are getting extracted ...")
1225            try:
1226                with zipfile.ZipFile(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects.zip"), "r") as zip_ref:
1227                    zip_ref.extractall(pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects"))
1228                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info(
1229                    "Demo projects are downloaded and extracted.\n Import of demo projects started ...",
1230                )
1231            except Exception as e:
1232                constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Extraction process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1233                basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects",
1234                               "Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1235                               QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1236                self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Extraction process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1237                return
1238        try:
1239            path_of_demo_projects = pathlib.Path(f"{constants.SETTINGS_DIR}/demo-projects")
1240            for tmp_filename in os.listdir(path_of_demo_projects):
1241                # Copy db file into new workspace
1242                tmp_project_database_filepath = str(
1243                    pathlib.Path(
1244                        f"{self._interface_manager.get_application_settings().workspace_path}/{tmp_filename}"
1245                    )
1246                )
1247                tmp_src_filepath = str(pathlib.Path(f"{path_of_demo_projects}/{tmp_filename}"))
1248                shutil.copyfile(tmp_src_filepath, tmp_project_database_filepath)
1249            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.info("Import process of demo projects finished.")
1250        except Exception as e:
1251            constants.PYSSA_LOGGER.error(f"Import process of demo projects finished with the error: {e}.")
1252            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Import process of demo projects finished with an error. Check the logs to get more information.",
1253                           QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Critical)
1254            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Import process of demo projects finished with an error.")
1255        else:
1256            self._interface_manager.refresh_workspace_model()
1257            self._interface_manager.refresh_main_view()
1258            basic_boxes.ok("Get Demo Projects", "Getting demo projects finished without errors.",
1259                       QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Information)
1260            self._interface_manager.update_status_bar("Getting demo projects finished successfully.")

def open_context_menu_for_proteins(self, position): 
1621    def open_context_menu_for_proteins(self, position):
1622        indexes = self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.selectedIndexes()
1623        if len(indexes) > 0:
1624            level = 0
1625            index = indexes[0]
1626            while index.parent().isValid():
1627                index = index.parent()
1628                level += 1
1629        else:
1630            return
1631
1632        tmp_type = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_type()
1633
1634        if tmp_type == "protein":
1635            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_current_protein_tree_index_object()
1636        elif tmp_type == "chain":
1637            tmp_protein = self._interface_manager.get_parent_index_object_of_current_protein_tree_index()
1638        else:
1639            logger.warning("Unknown object type occurred in Protein tab.")
1640            return
1641        tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair: bool = self._interface_manager.get_current_project().check_if_protein_is_in_any_protein_pair(
1642            tmp_protein.get_molecule_object()
1643        )
1644        self.protein_context_menu = QtWidgets.QMenu()
1645        if level == 0:
1646            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Clean selected protein"))
1647            self.proteins_context_menu_clean_action.triggered.connect(self.clean_protein_update)
1648            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Rename selected protein"))
1649            self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.triggered.connect(self.rename_selected_protein_structure)
1650
1651            # <editor-fold desc="Check if protein is in any protein pair">
1652            if tmp_is_protein_in_any_pair:
1653                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(False)
1654            else:
1655                self.proteins_context_menu_rename_action.setEnabled(True)
1656
1657            # </editor-fold>
1658
1659        elif level == 1:
1660            tmp_show_sequence_action = self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Show sequence"))
1661            tmp_show_sequence_action.triggered.connect(self._show_protein_chain_sequence)
1662        elif level == 2:
1663            self.protein_context_menu.addAction(self._view.tr("Edit object"))
1664
1665        self.protein_context_menu.exec_(self._view.ui.proteins_tree_view.viewport().mapToGlobal(position))
def clean_protein_update(self) -> None: 
1904    def clean_protein_update(self) -> None:
1905        """Cleans the selected protein structure."""
1906        self._view.wait_spinner.start()
1907        if basic_boxes.yes_or_no(
1908            "Clean protein",

1917                    self._interface_manager.get_current_project().get_database_filepath(),
1918                ),
1919                post_func=self.__await_clean_protein_update,
1920            )

1922            self.update_status("Cleaning protein ...")
1923        else:
